content:
China’s New Red Guards: The Return of Radicalism and The Rebirth of Mao Zedong. By Jude D. Blanchette. Oxford University Press; 224 pages; $27.95

ONE OF the most important essays written by Mao Zedong was also ONE of his more turgid, a work published in 1937 entitled “On Contradictions”. Even the most casual observer of modern China can see that a Contradiction festers at the heart of Chinese politics: how can this consumerist, mercantilist economic superpower—with its stockmarkets, property bubbles and flamboyant billionaires—be ruled by a party that calls itself Communist, insists it practices socialism and crushes any attempt by workers or peasants to assert their rights?

wp.Even Field: 连场;偶数场;偶数图场;偶数域

wp.Even wear: 均匀磨耗;均匀磨损;平均磨耗;磨耗均匀

ex: n. 保护；警卫；卫兵；保卫
v. 警卫；守卫；保卫；看守
网络 后卫；警戒；防护装置
eg2: a security guard
安全警卫
border guards
边防卫士
The prisoner slipped past the guards on the gate and escaped.
犯人从门卫身旁溜出去逃走了。
A guard was posted outside the building.
建筑物外驻了一名警卫。
the captain of the guard
卫队长
the changing of the guard(= when one group replaces another)
卫队换岗
The guard is/are being inspected today.
今天卫队接受检阅。
Fellow airmen provided a guard of honour at his wedding.
空军战友们为他的婚礼充当仪仗队。
The President always travels with an armed guard .
总统出行总有武装卫队保驾。
a sentry on guard(= at his or her post, on duty)
执勤哨兵
to do guard duty
担任警戒任务
The escaped prisoner was brought back under armed guard .
越狱逃犯由武装警卫押回。
The terrorist was kept under police guard .
这名恐怖分子当时在警方的看管之下。
One of the men kept guard , while the other broke into the house.
一人放哨，另一人则闯进了房子里。
Ensure the guard is in place before operating the machine.
一定要在防护装置到位后才开机器。
to drop/keep up your guard
放弃╱保持防御姿势
In spite of the awkward questions the minister never let his guard fall for a moment.
尽管遇到些令人尴尬的问题，部长从没有放松警惕。
Four soldiers stood guard over the coffin.
有四名士兵守护灵柩。
Four soldiers stood guard over the coffin.
有四名士兵守护灵柩。
The lawyer's apparently innocent question was designed to catch the witness off (his) guard .
律师看似不经意的问题是为了使证人措手不及。
The lawyer's apparently innocent question was designed to catch the witness off (his) guard .
律师看似不经意的问题是为了使证人措手不及。
The dog was guarding its owner's luggage.
狗守护着主人的行李。
political leaders guarded by the police
由警方保卫的政界领袖们
You can't get in; the whole place is guarded.
你进不去，整个地区都戒备森严。
a closely guarded secret
严守的秘密
The prisoners were guarded by soldiers.
犯人由士兵看守。

ex: n. 内部；里面；内侧；（靠近路边的）慢车道
adj. 内部的；里面的；从内部了解到的；内线干的
adv. 在（或向）里面；在监狱里；被监禁
prep. 在（或向）…内；在（或向）…里；少于（某时间）
网络 在里面；身在其中
eg2: Go inside the house.
进屋里吧。
Inside the box was a gold watch.
盒子里装着一只金表。
For years we had little knowledge of what life was like inside China.
以往很多年我们对于中国国内的生活情况所知甚少。
You'll feel better with a good meal inside you.
你肚子饱了感觉就会好些的。
Inside most of us is a small child screaming for attention.
我们大多数人的内心都藏着一个呼求关注的小孩。
The job is unlikely to be finished inside (of) a year
这项工作不大可能在一年之内完成。
She shook it to make sure there was nothing inside.
她把它晃了晃，以确定里面没有东西。
We had to move inside(= indoors) when it started to rain.
开始下雨了，我们只好躲进屋里。
I pretended not to care but I was screaming inside.
表面上我佯装不在乎，但内心却在高声喊叫。
He was sentenced to three years inside.
他被判三年监禁。
The inside of the box was blue.
盒子的内面呈蓝色。
The door was locked from the inside.
门从里面锁上了。
The shell is smooth on the inside.
贝壳内壁光滑。
the insides of the windows
窗户的内侧
He tried to overtake on the inside .
他试图从慢车道超车。
The French runner is coming up fast on the inside.
法国的赛跑选手正从内圈迅速赶上来。
She was so nervous, her insides were like jelly.
她紧张得六神无主。
You've got your sweater on inside out.
你把毛线衫里外穿反了。
Turn the bag inside out and let it dry.
把包翻过来晾干。
You've got your sweater on inside out.
你把毛线衫里外穿反了。
Turn the bag inside out and let it dry.
把包翻过来晾干。
The thieves must have had someone on the inside helping them.
这些窃贼肯定有内应。
The thieves must have had someone on the inside helping them.
这些窃贼肯定有内应。
The burglars had turned the house inside out.
窃贼把房子翻了个底朝天。
The new manager turned the old systems inside out.
新任经理对旧体制进行了彻底的改革。
The burglars had turned the house inside out.
窃贼把房子翻了个底朝天。
The new manager turned the old systems inside out.
新任经理对旧体制进行了彻底的改革。
the inside pages of a newspaper
报纸的内页
an inside pocket
里袋
I was driving in the inside lane(= the part nearest the edge, not the middle of the road) .
我当时驾车在慢车道上行驶。
inside information
内部情报
Any newspaper would pay big money to get the inside story on her marriage.
任何一家报纸都愿出高价购买她婚姻的内幕消息。
The robbery appeared to have been an inside job .
这次抢劫像是内部人干的。

ex: n. 犹大书（圣经新约的一书）

wp.Jude Ciccolella: 斯克勒拉;祖德·塞克利拉;尤德·斯科勒拉

eg2: But  has it in there.
但这些东西在《犹大书》里还有。
His lab at St.  Children’s Research Hospital in Memphis is the world’s only laboratory that studies the human-animal interface of influenza.
他在孟斐斯圣朱迪儿童研究医院的实验室是世界上唯一的研究可以同时在动物和人类中蔓延的流感的实验室。
He has Jude Stewart draft blog posts for him (not all of them), based on meetings they have.
他会与朱迪·斯图瓦特会面，由后者为他起草博客贴文的草稿（并非全部）。

ex: n. 牛津鞋（一种系鞋带的皮鞋）

n. 激进主义
n. 再生；复兴
n. 返回；回报；回来；收益
v. 返回；回报；回来；恢复
网络 归还；回归；返回值
eg2: I waited a long time for him to return.
我等他回来等了很长时间。
She's returning to Australia tomorrow after six months in Europe.
她在欧洲逗留了六个月，明天要返回澳大利亚了。
I returned from work to find the house empty.
我下班回来，发现屋里空无一人。
When did she return home from the trip?
她是什么时候旅行回来的？
We had to return the hairdryer to the store because it was faulty.
我们不得不将吹风机退回商店，因为它有残损。
I must return some books to the library.
我得把一些书还给图书馆。
Don't forget to return my pen!
别忘了把钢笔还给我！
I returned the letter unopened.
我原封不动地将信退了回去。
The following day the pain returned.
第二天又疼起来了。
Her suspicions returned when things started going missing again.
发现又有东西丢失的时候，她又怀疑起来。
He returns to this topic later in the report.
他在报告中后来又提到这个话题。
She looked up briefly then returned to her sewing.
她抬头看了一眼，又接着做她的针线活儿。
The doctor may allow her to return to work next week.
医生也许会允许她下周回去上班。
Train services have returned to normal after the strike.
罢工过后，列车运营已经恢复正常。
to return a favour/greeting/stare
报恩；回应问候；回瞪一眼
She phoned him several times but he was too busy to return her call .
她给他打了几次电话，但他太忙，不能给她回电话。
It's time we returned their invitation(= invite them to sth as they invited us to sth first) .
该我们回请他们了。
He did not return her love.
他没有回报她的爱。
‘You were both wonderful!’ ‘So were you!’ we said, returning the compliment .
“你们俩太棒了！”“你也一样啊！”我们也称赞道。
to return fire(= to shoot at sb who is shooting at you)
用枪炮还击
to return a service/shot
击回发球╱抽球
The jury returned a verdict of not guilty.
陪审团宣告了无罪的判决。
to return a high rate of interest
有很高的利息回报
Last year the company returned a loss of £157 million.
去年，公司的亏损达 1.57 亿英镑。
He was met by his brother on his return from Italy.
他从意大利回来的时候，是他弟弟去接他的。
I saw the play on its return to Broadway.
这部戏重回百老汇时我看过了。
on the return flight/journey/trip
在返回的航班╱旅程╱路程上
We would appreciate the prompt return of books to the library.
若能及时将图书归还给图书馆，我们将不胜感激。
The judge ordered the return of the child to his mother.
法官命令将孩子送还他的母亲。
Write your return address(= the address that a reply should be sent to) on the back of the envelope.
请在信封的背面写明回信地址。
the return of spring
春之归来
a return of my doubts
我的疑心又起
his return to power
他的重新掌权
They appealed for a return to work(= after a strike) .
他们呼吁复工。
a high rate of return on capital
资本的高回报率
farmers seeking to improve returns from their crops
寻求提高农作物利润的农民
census returns
人口普查报告
election returns(= the number of votes for each candidate in an election)
选举结果报告
To exit this option, press return.
要退出这个选项，就按返回键。
a powerful return of serve
势大力沉的接发球
Please reply by return of post.
请即赐复。
Please reply by return of post.
请即赐复。
Can I buy you lunch in return for your help?
感谢你帮忙，我请你吃午饭好吗？
I asked her opinion, but she just asked me a question in return.
我征求她的意见，她却只是反问了我一句。
Can I buy you lunch in return for your help?
感谢你帮忙，我请你吃午饭好吗？
I asked her opinion, but she just asked me a question in return.
我征求她的意见，她却只是反问了我一句。

ex: art. 这；那
adv. 更加（用于比较级，最高级前）

wp.THE APPRENTICE: 飞黄腾达;学徒电视秀;学徒

ex: n. （综合性）大学；高等学府
网络 综合性大学；综合大学；学校
eg2: Is there a university in this town?
这座城市有没有大学？
Ohio State University
俄亥俄州立大学
the University of York
约克大学
York University
约克大学
Both their children are at university .
他们的两个孩子都在上大学。
He's hoping to go to university next year.
他希望明年能上大学。
a university course/degree/lecturer
大学课程╱学位╱讲师
a degree from the university of life
人生大学学位
a degree from the university of life
人生大学学位

ex: 网络 康子东
vt. 维护，坚持；断言；主张；声称
eg2: “If you fail to avoid high inequality, you will need more prisons and more police,” they .
“如果不能消除这种高度的不平等，你们将需要更多的监狱和警察，”他们断言。
At the same time, the manager should step in and assert authority only when required, which should be rarely.
与此同时，经理应该只有在需要时插手并声称权力，这应该很少发生。
One difference is that you can , for instance, that the plan-driven approach will extend our project duration from twelve to fourteen weeks, an increase of two weeks.
区别之一就是您能够断言，例如计划驱动的方法将把您的项目周期从十二周扩展到十四周，增加了两周的时间。

ex: n. 亿万富翁

wp.Rebel Billionaire: 速成亿万富翁;叛逆的亿万富翁

eg2: So, who can become a ?
因此，谁能成为亿万富翁？
The billionaire refuse to contribute to the refugees.
那位亿万富翁拒绝为难民们捐款。
In this fictional country there is a  who lives on the fringes of society who, come nightfall, dresses as a bat.
在这个虚幻国度中，有一位生活在社会边缘的亿万富翁，打扮得像只蝙蝠一样出现在傍晚。

ex: n. 气泡，泡沫，泡状物；透明圆形罩，圆形顶
vi. 沸腾，冒泡；发出气泡声
vt. 使冒泡；滔滔不绝地说
n. 临时工；便装；便鞋
adj. 不经意的；无忧无虑的；漫不经心的；不在乎的
网络 偶然的；随便的；临时的
eg2: a casual manner
漫不经心的样子
It was just a casual remark─I wasn't really serious.
我只是随便说说，并不当真。
He tried to sound casual, but I knew he was worried.
他讲话时试图显得不在乎，但我知道他心里着急。
They have a casual attitude towards safety(= they don't care enough) .
他们对安全问题采取无所谓的态度。
a casual glance
随便扫一眼
It's obvious even to the casual observer.
即便再马虎的人也能一眼看明白是怎么回事。
casual clothes(= comfortable clothes that you choose to wear in your free time)
便装
family parties and other casual occasions
家庭聚会和其他非正式场合
casual workers/labour
临时工
Students sometimes do casual work in the tourist trade.
学生有时做些旅游方面的零工。
They are employed on a casual basis(= they do not have a permanent job with the company) .
他们被雇为临时工。
a casual acquaintance
泛泛之交
a casual friendship
一般的友谊
to have casual sex(= to have sex without having a steady relationship with that partner)
做露水鸳鸯
a casual encounter/meeting
不期而遇；邂逅
a casual passer-by
碰巧过路的人
The exhibition is interesting to both the enthusiast and the casual visitor.
热心的爱好者和碰巧来参观的人都认为这个展览有意思。
The disease is not spread by casual contact.
此病不会通过偶然接触传染。
dressed in casuals
穿着便装

ex: adj. 消费主义的
n. 用户至上主义者；主张消费主义的人

wp.the consumerist: 消费主义者;消费者网站

wp.In contradiction: 矛盾中;陷入矛盾之中;在矛盾;在矛盾中

ex: n. 矛盾；否认；反驳
eg2: Motion itself is a .
运动本身就是矛盾。
The  has become apparent.
矛盾表面化了。
A generous miser is a  in terms.
“慷慨的吝啬鬼”是一种语词矛盾的说法。

ex: vt. 称做…；定名为…；给…称号；使…有权利

wp.entitle thereto: 有权及其;有权公约;其有权
wp.entitle e: 使有资格;给予权利;使;给…命名
wp.entitle to: 赋予…做;给……权利;有权向;享有权利

ex: vi. 溃烂；化脓
vt. 使……溃烂；使……痛苦；使……恶化
n. 溃烂；脓疮，脓疱
eg2: The wound began to .
伤口开始化脓。
For the truth is that unless we can forgive, we can never recover. Our wounds will continue to  and never heal.
这是因为存在这样的真理：如果我们不原谅别人，就永远无法修复自己的创伤，伤口会继续溃烂，永不愈合。
By expressing your feelings and talking through (not yelling, mind you) problems, you don’t give them a chance to fester and grow.
表达你的感受并且讨论问题， 这样你就不会给问题一个溃烂或者增长的机会。

ex: adj. 炫耀的；卖弄的；艳丽的；绚丽夺目的
n. 火焰色红花
网络 辉耀的；火焰似的；华丽的
eg2: a flamboyant gesture/style/personality
炫耀的手势╱作风╱个性
flamboyant clothes/designs
艳丽的衣服；华丽的设计

ex: n. 观察员；观察者；观察家；观测者
网络 观察者模式；观察家报；观察器
eg2: According to observers, the plane exploded shortly after take-off.
据目击者说，飞机起飞后不久就爆炸了。
To the casual observer(= somebody who does not pay much attention) , the system appears confusing.
乍看起来，这个系统好像条理不清。
